channel.title: 508 Adding item on an interface
channel.description:
Alright well I'm trying to add Full Smithing to my 508, and when i open the smithing interface it looks like this:
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/68dj74.jpg[/img]
And I'm trying to add the item picture to the interface.
I've been told this has something to do with creating a frame, so how would i go about doing that?
